sentences: Kui koondamine tuleb, siis olen mina vist esimene, kes sule sappa saab.
Kui sa nii lohakalt edasi töötad, on sul varsti sulg sabas.
Ega muud, kui koolipreilid saavad kadedaks, et sul nii kenasti veab, pistavad sulle enne kevadet paberid pihku ja sule sappa.
context: The word 'vallandatud' is derived from the verb 'vallandama' which means to drive away or expel. In this context, it describes someone who has been dismissed from their job position, fired, or given the boot. The term comes from the imagery of being driven out like cattle or pushed out forcefully.
